 1.2 - TIME-BASED MEDIA
SIGN LANGUAGE (PRERECORDED)(LEVEL AAA)
On accessible websites...

Sign language interpretation is provided for all prerecorded audio content in
synchronized media. 

These websites...

Provide alternatives for time-based media.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
Example 1. A corporation is making an important announcement to all of its
employees. The announcement will be held in the main headquarters and later
streamed to the Web. A sign language interpreter is provided at the announcement
location for the employees that are present in the meeting room. For the Web
version of the announcement, the sign language interpreter is shown/superimposed
in the corner of the display. Iâ€™d like to know a little more
